title: BC报错
author: ♂苦力怕♂
txt_content:
BC启动时报错？  登不上，信息如下



15:53:09 [信息] Unable to initialize fancy terminal. To fix this on Windows, ins
tall the correct Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 Runtime
15:53:09 [信息] NOTE: This error is non crucial, and BungeeCord will still funct
ion correctly! Do not bug the author about it unless you are still unable to get
 it working
15:53:09 [信息] Using standard Java JCE cipher. To enable the OpenSSL based nati
ve cipher, please make sure you are using 64 bit Ubuntu or Debian with libssl in
stalled.
15:53:09 [信息] Enabled BungeeCord version git:BungeeCord-Bootstrap:1.8-SNAPSHOT
:"ef364d9":1021
15:53:10 [信息] Discovered module: ModuleSpec(name=cmd_alert, file=modules\cmd_a
lert.jar, provider=JenkinsModuleSource())

nd.jar, provider=JenkinsModuleSource())

st.jar, provider=JenkinsModuleSource())

nd.jar, provider=JenkinsModuleSource())

server.jar, provider=JenkinsModuleSource())

reconnect_yaml.jar, provider=JenkinsModuleSource())

SHOT:"ef364d9":1021 by SpigotMC
15:53:10 [信息] Loaded plugin cmd_find version git:cmd_find:1.8-SNAPSHOT:"ef364d
9":1021 by SpigotMC
15:53:10 [信息] Loaded plugin cmd_server version git:cmd_server:1.8-SNAPSHOT:"ef
364d9":1021 by SpigotMC

4d9":1021 by SpigotMC

9":1021 by SpigotMC

9":1021 by SpigotMC

is not defined

ditions.java:145)

a:111)

r.java:50)

replies.author: 翼LOVE·小爱
replies.txt_content:
使用Notepad++编辑配置[必须] 如果是添加子服务器 直接复制上面的服务器信息下来修改 这样可以减少错误概率 
另外，确定开启和关闭是否写对
开启true 关闭false

replies.author: LocusAzzurro
replies.txt_content:
错误信息是 默认服务器"Lobby"未定义

检查一下BC的配置中默认进入服务器的名字是否设置正确/是否有对应名称的子服服务端文件夹
